body: It's nice for someone to criticize with proper standards and viewpoints. Good review. People usually go to "scientifically proven facts" to spit at someone's fetish.
@GuilhermeAlves I am glad you enjoyed the review, It Is always my duty to leave reviews which help the reader decide after reading It on a second opinion, and or just for laughs.

Absolutely fantastic, from the blowjob scene to the art style, I loved everything about It, the way the author conveyed the cuteness of fucking a shota and gentleness of a sister was great, the blowjob scene was simple yet I nutted 2 times to It, the plot Is cliche yet It gets the job done (as is the purpose}

The art style Is unique and conveys the authors' portrayal of cuteness yet lewdness In a gentle and subtle way, with the sharp gorgeous outlines on the characters all the way to the gentle way he draws the bodies and eyes of everyone. All In all, I rate It a 10/10
